alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southeastern Walton and Washington Counties through 1245 PM EDT/1145 AM CDT/... At 1200 PM EDT/1100 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of Vernon to 9 miles southeast of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Vernon, Bradford, Live Oak, Wausau, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Seminole Hills, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Bunker, Smyrna, Sylvania, West Bay, Red Bay, Inlet Beach, Orange Hill, Greenhead, Bruce and Red Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
